mapper.select: select test_list_id, test_code, test_list_state, test_list_time, appointment_id, treatment.reception_id, patient.patient_id, patient.patient_name, test_list_saved from tests_list, treatment, patient where tests_list.treatment_id = treatment.treatment_id And tests_list.test_list_req = 1 And date_format(tests_list.test_list_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') And treatment.patient_id = patient.patient_id
select EXISTS (select * from tests_list where test_list_id=#{test_list_id} limit 1)

select patient.patient_id ,patient_name ,patient_tel ,patient_birth ,patient_medicine ,patient_disease ,patient_comment ,patient_gender from patient, tests_list, treatment where patient.patient_id = treatment.patient_id and tests_list.treatment_id = treatment.treatment_id and tests_list.test_list_id = #{test_list_id} LIMIT 1
select * from test_results, test_details where test_list_id = #{test_list_id} and test_results.test_details_id = test_details.test_details_id
